definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 40:10 tendril, twig (from interlacing; cf. Ar. 4ariyjah;un palm-leaf braid, etc.; Eth. masgart: net (Prä:BASi. 371); Aram. [[סְרִיגׇא]], sriygto0 network, lattice);—of vine, pl. [[שָׂרִיגִם]] Ge 40:10, [[שָׂרִגִים]] v:Ge 40:12; of fig-tree, sf. [[שָׂרִיגֶיהָ]] Joe 1:7.
